name: Aliens VS Asteroids
description:
This is my own modfication of 2d shooter! 

 The main idea you can choose the level from hub (Space). 

 I spent time for make UI and try to make collision work. 

Game small, but have a fun!

  •  My modofication: Two custom LVL: Asteroids and Invaders
  •  Main Hub with Planet (they includes lvl) 
  •  Collision trigger script (work with planet)
  •  Custom main menu 
  •  New music 
  •  New UI system for my game loop 
  •  And other litle details 

Credit:

Developed by Pavel Shipiguzov
